bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Application Guide for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Using Separately Mounted Current-Limiting Fuses (Revision of IEEE C37.27-1987)
IEEE Draft Application Guide for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Using Separately Mounted Current-Limiting Fuses (Revision of IEEE C37.27-1987)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide provides information to assist in selection of current-limiting fuses for use in low with voltage ac power circuit breakers with separately mounted current-limiting fuses.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
